title: JSON schema for doukutsu-rs music table files

version.description: Major version of the music table format - incremented if backwards-incompatible changes occur

songs.description: Array of song information for the music table

name.description: Name of the song file (without extension)

id.description: Song ID used in commands like <CMUxxxx (corresponds to index in the table)

noLooping.description: If true, prevents the song from looping after it finishes (optional, defaults to false)
